message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $110 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $95 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something a little closer to my original price. How about $105?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $100 for it.
